value.message: Use of error log level for recoverable issue when fetching NPM package info.
value.suggestion: Use warn or info log level instead of error for recoverable failures.

value.message: Error logging in catch block does not include stack trace or context information.
value.suggestion: Log error.stack and relevant context such as input parameters.

value.message: Use of error log level for recoverable issue when fetching GitHub repo info.
value.suggestion: Use warn or info log level instead of error for recoverable failures.

value.message: Error logging in catch block does not include stack trace or context information.
value.suggestion: Log error.stack and relevant context such as input parameters.

value.message: Access control error handling in getNPMPackageInfo falls back to returning null on error, which may not securely deny access if used in permission checks.
value.suggestion: Ensure that errors in access control or permission checks result in explicit denial (e.g., throw or return an access denied error), not just null.

value.message: Access control error handling in getGitHubRepoInfo falls back to returning null on error, which may not securely deny access if used in permission checks.
value.suggestion: Ensure that errors in access control or permission checks result in explicit denial (e.g., throw or return an access denied error), not just null.
